title: Georgy Kondratyev
text:
Georgy Petrovich Kondratyev (; ; born 7 January 1960) is a Belarusian <a href="Association%20football">football</a> coach and former Belarusian and Soviet footballer. From 2011 to 2014 he was in charge of <a href="Belarus%20national%20football%20team">Belarus national team</a>. In 2018, he managed <a href="FC%20Belshina%20Bobruisk">Belshina Bobruisk</a>.
Honours.
Dinamo Minsk
Chornomorets Odessa
International career.
Kondratyev made his debut for the <a href="Soviet%20Union%20national%20football%20team">Soviet Union</a> on 10 October 1984 in a <a href="1986%20FIFA%20World%20Cup">1986 FIFA World Cup</a> qualifier against <a href="Norway%20national%20football%20team">Norway</a>. He scored 4 goals for the national team, including two in another World Cup qualifier, against <a href="Switzerland%20national%20football%20team">Switzerland</a> on 2 May 1985. He was however not selected for the World Cup squad.
